Rulings.Edison:
●Placing a Bushido Counter onto Six Samurai United does not start a Chain.
●Sending Six Samurai United to the GY is a cost to activate its effect.
●When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Six Samurai monster, place a Bushido Counter onto Six Samurai United.

Rulings.Base:
1. Placing a Bushido Counter onto "Six Samurai United" does not start a Chain.
\n2. Sending "Six Samurai United" to the GY is a cost to activate its effect.
\n3. When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a 'Six Samurai' monster, place a Bushido Counter onto "Six Samurai United".
